Terry "Buzzy" Johnson (amụrụ Isaiah Johnson, November 12, 1938), bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu.
A mụrụ Johnson na Baltimore, Maryland, ma too dị ka ónyé agbata obi nke Sonny Til nke The Orioles na Earl Hurley nké The Swallows
N'afọ 1954, Johnson guzobere The Whispers (enweghị njikọ na otu a ma ama na Los Angeles) ya na ndị enyi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị anọ, ma dekọọ maka Gotham Records (nke dị na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania)
O dere, hazie ma bụrụ abụ na "Fool Heart" na "Are You Sorry?", nkè e wepụtara na 1955.
N'afọ 2017, Johnson wepụtara egwu abụọ No
1 na European Indie Music Chart na-emebi ndekọ màkà ịbụ No

1 màkà izu anọ ma gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ playlist na Spotify. Magazin Pollstar na-akpọ ya "Musical Chameleon". Boyz II Men kpọtara ya na ónyé ya na ya na-emepụta Theresa Trigg maka mbipụta CD ha nke afọ 2017 n'okpuru The Streetlight, ebe ha mepụtara usoro ya a ma ama nke "I Only Have Eyes For You", nke Johnson haziri, bụrụ ma kpọọ ụbọ maka The Flamingos.
